entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
